Package peer

package peer
  • Interface Summary

    Description
    Header
     
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Address
    Used as an holder for the input address and port
    Chunk
    Used to store the chunk metadata
    File
    Used to store the metadata of the local file to backup and make operations on its chunks
    Handler
    Used as a worker, processes the received messages and sends the response
    HeaderConcrete
     
    MulticastDispatcher
     
    ParseError
    Exception thrown when a error on a message is found
    Peer
    Sinleton class that holds the peer info and implements the RemoteInterface (RMI server)
    RemoteFile
    Used to store metadata from files that the peer has backed up
    RestoreFile
    used to store the data of a file while restoring it
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    MessageType
    Enum with a message type for every kind of message, each enum element knows how to process itself
